repository.name: Nexus-p2p-marketplace
repository.description: Nexus P2P Marketplace with Cross-Token Trading Support

crossTokenTrading.description: Support for Token/Token trading pairs (e.g., CARBON/GOLD)
crossTokenTrading.implementation: Enhanced token discovery with automatic pair generation

enhancedTokenDiscovery.description: Automatic discovery of user tokens and generation of trading pairs
enhancedTokenDiscovery.implementation: Scans user accounts and tokens to create comprehensive trading options

automaticAccountDetection.description: Auto-detection of required accounts for trading operations
automaticAccountDetection.implementation: Smart account matching based on token tickers and balances

tradingPairValidation.description: Comprehensive validation of trading pair requirements
tradingPairValidation.implementation: Validates account availability and balances before order creation

2.0.0.summary: Added cross-token trading support and enhanced token discovery
details: Implemented Token/Token trading pairs beyond Token/NXS
Enhanced token discovery system for multi-user environments
Improved automatic account detection and validation
Better UI organization with grouped trading pairs
Enhanced error handling and user feedback
Comprehensive logging for debugging and monitoring
